entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:15 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ENE 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 08:16 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
